\whitespace trim <% if [has[related]] %> -----
Related
    <$list filter="[enlist{!!related}]">
  • <$link/>
<% endif %> <% if [contains:related] [backlinks[]] %> -----
Linked here
    <$list filter="[contains:related] [backlinks[]] +[unique[]sortan[]]">
  • <$link/>
<% endif %>
